NK015(ba)008:0: sgyu 'phrul brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bka' rgyud gser phreng zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK015(ba)008:1: na mo rat+na gu ru ye /
NK015(ba)008:2: ka dag kun bzang gdod nas ye sangs rgyas /
NK015(ba)008:4: / 'khor 'das mnyam nyid gnyis med klong du gyur //
NK015(ba)008:5: dang po'i sangs rgyas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
NK015(ba)008:6: gsang bdag chen po khyed la mi phyed 'dud //
NK015(ba)008:7: rgyal sras dbang phyug gsang ba'i bdag po'i sku //
NK015(ba)008:8: sangs rgyas stong gi bstan pa 'dzin byed cing //
NK015(ba)008:9: gdul dka' 'dul mdzad phyag na rdo rje bsnams //
NK015(ba)008:10: gsang bdag gnyis pa'i zhabs la gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)008:11: thub pa lung bstan o rgyan mkha' 'gro'i gtso //
NK015(ba)008:12: gsang sngags rgyud sde zab mo'i rgyud 'chang ba //
NK015(ba)008:13: rin chen mang gi rnam 'phrul thams cad mkhyen //
NK015(ba)008:14: ku ru ra tsa'i zhabs la gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)008:15: rgyal ba'i zhabs slob ma 'ongs lung bstan pa //
NK015(ba)008:16: chos kyi rgyal po nges ston rgya mtsho'i bdag /
NK015(ba)008:17: tshe gcig sangs rgyas sa la gshegs mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)008:18: in+t+ra bo d+hi'i zhabs la gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)008:19: gsung rabs rgyud sde zab mo'i pha rol phyin //
NK015(ba)008:20: don bcud gsang sngags zab mo'i gnas lugs rtogs /
NK015(ba)008:22: / 'dod yon spang med rnam dag lam du khyer //
NK015(ba)008:23: sh+aakya pu tra'i zhabs gsung rab rgya mtsho'i gzhung don khong du chud //
NK015(ba)008:24: ka dag gnas lugs rang byung 'gyur med rtogs //
NK015(ba)008:25: sa brgyad mnon mdzad stobs kyi pha rol phyir //
NK015(ba)008:26: sa brgyad sems ma'i zhabs theg chen rnal 'byor gsang sngags zab mo'i bdag /
NK015(ba)008:27: bla med rdo rje theg pa'i don rtogs nas //
NK015(ba)008:28: tshe gcig tshe 'dir rig 'dzin mchog thob pa //
NK015(ba)008:29: rdo rje yon tan gzungs la gsol yan lag thugs kyi sgor zhugs dngos grub brnyes //
NK015(ba)008:30: mi 'gyur bde stong dbyer med rdo rje 'dzin //
NK015(ba)008:31: zab mo'i bstan pa'i mnga' bdag chos kyi rje //
NK015(ba)008:32: grub chen h+aum ka ra la gsang sngags phyi nang chos la mnga' brnyes shing //
NK015(ba)008:33: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams zhal gzigs nas //
NK015(ba)008:34: sna tshogs thabs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)008:35: pra chen ha sti'i zhabs 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi thugs rjes rjes bzung nas //
NK015(ba)008:36: phyi nang theg pa'i chos rnams thugs la rdzogs //
NK015(ba)008:37: ngo mtshar gzhung dang gdams pa du ma'i gter //
NK015(ba)008:38: sangs rgyas gsang ba'i zhabs 'od dpag med kyi rnam 'phrul 'chi med sku //
NK015(ba)008:39: d+ha na ko sha'i mtsho gling pad+mara skyes //
NK015(ba)008:40: sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyas mdzad chos gter bdag /
NK015(ba)008:41: o rgyan pad+ma zhabs pan chen du ma mdzes pa'i dbus na mdzes //
NK015(ba)008:42: rigs pa'i gnas lnga ma lus thugs la rdzogs //
NK015(ba)008:43: rgya gar mkhas pa'i mchog gyur bi ma la //
NK015(ba)008:44: dri med bshes gnyen zhabs lung rig gsung gi dbang phyug mnga' brnyes shing //
NK015(ba)008:45: pha rol smra ba'i log rtog tshar gcod cing //
NK015(ba)008:46: zab rgyas chos kyi rgya mtshor bsgyur mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)008:47: lo ts+aa rin chen zhabs thub dbang bstan pa'i rgyu 'bras theg pa la //
NK015(ba)008:48: ji bzhin ma nor mngon sum rtogs gyur nas //
NK015(ba)008:49: zag med dgong pa mchog la mnga' brnyes pa //
NK015(ba)008:50: kye re mchog skyong zhabs rnam dag theg pa'i lung chos thugs la rdzogs //
NK015(ba)008:51: gsang sngags zab mo'i sgrub rgyud bstan pa 'dzin //
NK015(ba)008:52: zag med zung 'jug mngon sum rtogs pa yi //
NK015(ba)008:53: rgyal ba yon tan zhabs thub dbang bstan pa'i dpal la mnga' brnyes shing //
NK015(ba)008:54: mi 'gyur ye shes go 'phang mchog thob nas //
NK015(ba)008:55: lus can theg mchog lam la bkod mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)008:56: ye shes rin chen zhabs la mkhyen rab stong nyid rgya mtsho chen po la /
NK015(ba)008:58: / 'gags med snying rje'i rlabs chen kun nas g.yos //
NK015(ba)008:59: gsang sngags zab don rin chen 'byung ba'i gnas //
NK015(ba)008:60: yon tan rgya mtsho'i zhabs de nyid sku yi sras gyur gsang sngags 'dzin //
NK015(ba)008:61: rab 'byams bstan pa'i srog shing mdzod gsum bdag /
NK015(ba)008:62: tshad med thugs rje'i bslab bya gting nas rdzogs //
NK015(ba)008:63: ye shes rgya mtsho'i zhabs gsang sngags zab mo'i gnas lugs khong du chud //
NK015(ba)008:64: yang phur sman gsum rgyud lung man ngag bcas //
NK015(ba)008:65: mkhas grub gnyis kyi rgyal rgyud 'dzin mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)008:66: blo gros byang chub zhabs sgyu 'phrul theg pa'i chos la dbang thob nas //
NK015(ba)008:67: nyon mongs ye shes chen por lam du khyer //
NK015(ba)008:68: gsang sngags mnga' brnyes bstan 'dzin chos kyi rje //
NK015(ba)008:69: sh+aakya 'byung gnas zhabs bskal mang sngon nas sbyang pa zhib pa'i mthus //
NK015(ba)008:70: theg chen gsang sngags zab mo'i don rtogs nas //
NK015(ba)008:71: bdag gzhan mchog gi sa la sbyor mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)008:72: zur chung shes grags la gnas kyi khyad 'phags rked lung zhes bya der //
NK015(ba)008:73: mdo bzhi bsdoms lnga la sogs gsang sngags chos //
NK015(ba)008:74: ma lus thugs su chud nas bsgrub pa mdzad //
NK015(ba)008:75: yang khing bla ma'i zhabs gzhung lugs rab 'byams don la mnga' brnyes shing //
NK015(ba)008:76: gdul bya mtha' dag theg pa'i lam la gzung //
NK015(ba)008:77: sangs rgyas bstan pa rgya cher spel mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)008:78: sh+aakya seng ge'i zhabs theg pa mtha' dag khong chud rdzogs chen po //
NK015(ba)008:79: ji bzhin rtogs nas gzung 'dzin rang sar grol //
NK015(ba)008:80: bdag gzhan don gnyis phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal //
NK015(ba)008:81: rdzogs chen pa zhes zhabs la rgya gar yul du byang chub sems sbyang nas //
NK015(ba)008:82: gangs can khrod 'dir gsang sngags bstan pa skyong //
NK015(ba)008:83: bde ba can der rgyal sras byang chub sems //
NK015(ba)008:84: sa bcu'i dbang phyug dam pa de la 'dud //
NK015(ba)008:85: lung rigs man ngag kun la mkhas gyur pa //
NK015(ba)008:86: mdo rgyud dgongs pa'i thugs la nyi ma shar //
NK015(ba)008:87: bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi bdag gzhan rgyud sbyangs pa //
NK015(ba)008:88: chos rje gtsang ston zhabs chos nyid rnam dag byams pa'i ri bo la //
NK015(ba)008:89: snying rje'i 'bras ldan dpag bsam 'bum gyis brgyan //
NK015(ba)008:90: mtshan mchog don ldan 'gro mgon chos kyi rje //
NK015(ba)008:91: byams pa chen po'i zhabs snang stong gnyis med chos dbyings nam mkha' la //
NK015(ba)008:92: gnas lugs 'gyur med rang byung rdo rje'i sku //
NK015(ba)008:93: lung bstan mchog thob rtsa ste spyang nga ba //
NK015(ba)008:94: nam mkha' rdo rje'i zhabs la rgyud sde bsrung zhing gsang sngags rdo rje 'dzin //
NK015(ba)008:95: thos bsam bsgoms pa'i bya ba mthar phyin nas /
NK015(ba)008:97: / 'chad rtsod brtsams pa'i don la ma rmongs pa //
NK015(ba)008:98: thugs rje'i ye shes zhabs la ldem dgongs brgyad dang mtha' drug tshul bzhin dang //
NK015(ba)008:99: brton pa bzhi dang gzhung gi 'bod len gyis //
NK015(ba)008:100: gsang sngags zab mo'i rgyud gzhung gtan la dbab //
NK015(ba)008:101: ston pa dbang 'byor zhabs dam rdzas bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i chen po bskyil //
NK015(ba)008:102: lung rigs dri med pad+mo'i kha phyes nas //
NK015(ba)008:103: blo gsal rkang drug ldan la dga' ston 'gyed //
NK015(ba)008:104: rje btsun dpa' 'bar zhabs kun mkhyen zab yang bstan pa'i mdzod 'dzin pa //
NK015(ba)008:105: sdom gsum rnam dag nyes ltung dri mas dben //
NK015(ba)008:106: mtshungs med chos rje gdul bya'i mgon gyur pa //
NK015(ba)008:107: ston pa mgon rgyal zhabs dri med tshul khrims rnam dag rgyal ba'i mtshan //
NK015(ba)008:108: theg mchog zab don ma lus thugs su tshud //
NK015(ba)008:109: mkhyen rabs 'jam dpal dbyangs dang gnyis med pa //
NK015(ba)008:110: tshul khrims rgyal mtshan zhabs mkhas pa rgya mtsho tshogs pa'i dbus na mdzes //
NK015(ba)008:111: sna tshogs theg pa'i gzhung lugs bshad rtsal che //
NK015(ba)008:112: rang 'dod med cing gzhan phan kho nar sems //
NK015(ba)008:113: d+har+m+aa klak+sha'i zhabs mdo sngags rgya mtsho'i dbus su legs 'khrungs shing //
NK015(ba)008:114: gsung rab pad+mo'i mnga' bdag chos kyi rje //
NK015(ba)008:115: don bcu sbrang rtsi lta bu'i bcud ldan pa //
NK015(ba)008:116: dz+ny+aa na ke tu'i zhabs mang thos gsung rab kun gyi mthar son cing //
NK015(ba)008:117: rgyal ba'i dbang po ji bzhin mkhyen gyur pa //
NK015(ba)008:118: mkhas mchog rnams kyi gtsug gi rgyan gyur pa //
NK015(ba)008:119: nam mkha' rgyal mtshan zhabs nam mkha' lta bur chos nyid klong gyur zhing /
NK015(ba)008:121: / 'gro ba'i dpal mgon bstan pa'i mnga' bdag mchog /
NK015(ba)008:122: pad+mas lung bstan skyes mchog sgro 'dogs pa //
NK015(ba)008:123: nam mkha' dpal ba'i zhabs mkhyen gnyis ye shes nam mkha'i nor bu ltar //
NK015(ba)008:124: klong gyur mdo sngags rgya mtsho ston mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)008:125: snga 'gyur bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan kha ba dkar //
NK015(ba)008:126: nam mkha' rgya mtsho'i zhabs bsod nams dpung ldan 'jam dbyangs rnam 'phrul mchog /
NK015(ba)008:127: mdo sngags bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan rin po che //
NK015(ba)008:128: snying bstan 'dzin mdzad chos rje yang khrod pa //
NK015(ba)008:129: bsod nams rgyal mtshan zhabs 'gro ba'i bsod nams legs 'khrungs rgyal ba'i sras //
NK015(ba)008:130: bla med rdo rje theg pa'i mdzod 'dzin pa //
NK015(ba)008:131: kahthoga bstan pa'i khur brjid mchod khang ba //
NK015(ba)008:132: bsod nams rdo rje'i zhabs bstan pa'i rgyal tshab chos nyid klong gyur nas //
NK015(ba)008:133: phyag rdzogs dgongs pa gsal mdzad bstan pa'i nyi //
NK015(ba)008:134: mi yi seng ge 'phrul zhig rgya sdong ba //
NK015(ba)008:135: bstan pa seng ge'i zhabs ma 'ongs 'gro la bkra shis dpal 'bar zhing //
NK015(ba)008:136: sgyu 'phrul theg pa'i rin chen mdzod 'chang ba //
NK015(ba)008:137: mdo sngags char 'bebs rdo rje 'dzin pa che /
NK015(ba)008:139: / 'jam dbyangs bdun rgyud tha ma yong khrod dbon //
NK015(ba)008:140: mang+ga rat+na'i zhabs chos nyid zab yangs rin chen 'byung ba'i gnas //
NK015(ba)008:141: mdo sngags char 'bebs rdo rje 'dzin pa che /
NK015(ba)008:143: / 'gro ba'i re skong bstan pa'i rgyan gyur pa //
NK015(ba)008:144: rat+na badz+ra zhabs la gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)008:145: nam mkha' dpal man chad kyi bla ma brgyud pa'i
NK015(ba)008:146: gsol 'debs shwa lo ka rnams rang gi dad rten
NK015(ba)008:147: du pad+ma bkra shis sogs don gnyer 'ag'i don du
NK015(ba)008:148: gnas chen rmugs sangs du rdo rje kun bzang rgya
NK015(ba)008:149: mtshos bris pa bkra shis dpal 'bar nam mkha'i mtha'
NK015(ba)008:151: de nas kahthoga tu sgyu 'phrul dbang gi brgyud pa ltar na /
NK015(ba)008:152: tshe gcig sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i brtul zhugs can //
NK015(ba)008:153: rim gnyis lam brtags mngon gyur spros med kyi //
NK015(ba)008:154: spyod pas gdug 'dre'i gnod pa dbyings su zhi //
NK015(ba)008:155: bud+d+ha mang+ga'i mtshan la gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)008:156: brtse chen thugs rjes gdul bya'i khams dbang bzhin //
NK015(ba)008:157: chos kyi dga' ston spel la mnga' brnyes pas //
NK015(ba)008:158: skal ldan thar gling 'dren pa'i dad dpon mchog /
NK015(ba)008:159: sh+aakya tshe ring dpal la bskyed rdzogs za ba mo'i don la dbang 'byor bas //
NK015(ba)008:160: rab 'byams dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho'i lha zhal mjal //
NK015(ba)008:161: dbugs dbyung gzengs bstod sa lam yon tan rdzogs //
NK015(ba)008:162: o rgyan phun tshogs mchog la rgyud rgyal gsang ba snying po'i dgongs pa'i don //
NK015(ba)008:163: ji bzhin mngon gyur grub pa'i rtags mtshan gyis /
NK015(ba)008:165: / 'gro mang dbang sdud zung 'jug lam la bkod //
NK015(ba)008:166: gyi ling thugs kyi rdo rjer gsol dam pa'i ris sad mkhas grub du ma las //
NK015(ba)008:167: mdo sngags snying po'i bcud blangs bya btang gis //
NK015(ba)008:168: tshe gcig spros med sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan btsugs //
NK015(ba)008:169: ma ti b+ha dri'i zhabs la mdo brgyud zab dgu'i chu gter srub pa las //
NK015(ba)008:170: legs thon bshad sgrub bstan pa'i nyin byed kyis //
NK015(ba)008:171: lung rtogs chos kyi gzi 'od rab 'bar ba //
NK015(ba)008:172: o rgyan chos kyi rgya mtsho dri med bshes gnyen gsang gsum rol pa'i kar //
NK015(ba)008:173: theg mchog bstan pa'i nyin byed shar ri'i phrag /
NK015(ba)008:174: legs 'char snying po'i bstan pa mkha' ltar brdal //
NK015(ba)008:175: kun mkhyen ngag gi dbang po 'jam dbyangs bla ma'i phrin las gcig bsdus pa //
NK015(ba)008:176: gzung spobs blo gros mchog la dbang 'byor bas //
NK015(ba)008:177: ris med brtan dang 'gro ba'i sgron me che //
NK015(ba)008:178: blo gros rgya mtsho'i dpal la dam pa de gsum ka las /
NK015(ba)008:179: lung rig man ngag rdzogs pa'i legs bshad kyis //
NK015(ba)008:180: skal bzang blo yi pad+mo 'dab brgyar bkrol //
NK015(ba)008:181: smin grol gdams pa'i zab mdzod nub med bskyangs //
NK015(ba)008:182: thub bstan dul ba'i sde la zhes sgyu 'phrul khams lugs dbang brgyud ltar kha skong ba'o //
NK015(ba)008:183: rmad byung legs bshad gsung gi nyin 'od kyis //
NK015(ba)008:184: rmongs pa'i rab rib kun nas 'phrog byed cing //
NK015(ba)008:185: skal bzang thar pa'i pad 'tshal rgyas mdzad pa //
NK015(ba)008:186: dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs 'bad de rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dang //
NK015(ba)008:187: bstan srung ma mgon lcam dral tshogs bcas kyi //
NK015(ba)008:188: dbang bzhi chu bos bdag rgyud smin mdzad nas //
NK015(ba)008:189: mos gus gdung ba'i gsol 'debs phyag 'tshal lo //
NK015(ba)008:190: de ltar bka' rgyud dri med gser phreng la //
NK015(ba)008:191: phyag 'tshal gsol btab bden pa'i byin rlabs kyi //
NK015(ba)008:192: rang rgyud smin cing gzhan rgyud grol ba dang //
NK015(ba)008:193: sku lnga yongs rdzogs gdul bya'i dpal du shog /
NK015(ba)008:194: ces sgyu 'phrul brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs bka' rgyud gser
NK015(ba)008:195: phreng zhes bya ba 'di ni mkhas grub chos rje
NK015(ba)008:196: ye shes rgyal mtshan pas mdzad nas dar rgyas par
NK015(ba)008:197: bya'o // yang na brgyud pa'i kha skong dpal yul ltar na /
NK015(ba)008:199: kun bzang dgongs don mkha' ltar klong gyur nas //
NK015(ba)008:200: shes rab sgron me'i rig mun tshogs rtsom //
NK015(ba)008:201: rnying bstan mnga' bdag bod khams mun sel rje //
NK015(ba)008:202: kun bzang shes rab zhabs la rnam smin tshe dbang phyag chen rig pa 'dzin //
NK015(ba)008:203: sku lnga lhun grub rdo rje 'chang chen po //
NK015(ba)008:204: ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyis rtag rol ba //
NK015(ba)008:205: lhun grub rgya mtsho'i zhabs la gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)008:206: lta spyod dkyil 'khor dbang bskur dam tshig dang //
NK015(ba)008:207: mchod sngags ting 'dzin phrin las sgrub pa yis //
NK015(ba)008:208: pad+ma'i bstan 'dzin dgos 'byung nor bu'i dbyig /
NK015(ba)008:209: pad+ma nor bu'i zhabs la dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med chos skur rtogs //
NK015(ba)008:210: phrin las rtag khyab lhun grub dpal dang ldan //
NK015(ba)008:211: mkhas btsun bzang po'i rnam thar rmad du byung //
NK015(ba)008:212: chos dpal bzang po'i zhabs sdom gsum gnang bkag gtsang ma'i pad+ma'i tshal //
NK015(ba)008:213: legs bshad mgrin glu sgrogs pa'i khra ma ra //
NK015(ba)008:214: zab rgyas chos kyi sbyin pa 'gyed mkhas pa //
NK015(ba)008:215: pad+ma sbyin pa'i zhabs la pad+ma'i bka' srol snga 'gyur bstan la zhugs //
NK015(ba)008:216: dka' thub bzod pa'i go cha cher bsgos pas //
NK015(ba)008:217: tshe gcig grub pa'i go 'phang mthon por gshegs //
NK015(ba)008:218: pad+ma bzod pa'i zhabs la phyag na pad+ma'i gsang gsum sgyu 'phrul bdar //
NK015(ba)008:219: snga 'gyur mdo sngags bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin //
NK015(ba)008:220: bstan 'gro'i don chen sgrub pa'i mthu stobs can //
NK015(ba)008:221: mdo sngags bstan 'dzin zhabs la phyogs dus rgyal ba'i mkhyen rtse nus pa'i gter //
NK015(ba)008:222: khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po nyi ma'i gnyen //
NK015(ba)008:223: rab 'byams 'gro khams rgya mtsho'i gtsug na brjid //
NK015(ba)008:224: chos kyi nyi ma'i zhabs la gsol ba 'debs //
NK015(ba)008:225: rmad byung legs bshad sogs dang sbrel /
